overview.name: Dell Products Ltd. Chengdu
overview.description: This location is a shipping and distributing site owned by Dell's Chinese branch. Though there are no pictures of the warehouse, data shows it has been consistently moving around Dell products from at least 2015. It is estimated they have spent over 8 million dollars on shipping costs since then. There is a mysterious gap in shipments in 2019, but they gradually went up again until they reached an all-time high in June of 2022.

overview.name: Dell Products L P 50Airways
overview.description: Another Dell-owned location, this is mainly a small storage unit for products such as Chromebooks. It also has made shipments in the past, but the amount has decreased drastically since 2019. This site receives many shipmens from Dell's Chegdu branch, as well as Compal's multiple sites in China.

overview.name: Compal Vietnam
overview.description: Compal is one of Dell's closest business associates. They manufacture computer parts such as screens, batteries, cases, and motherboards, many of which are specifically for Chromebooks. Some of the 51KD7 batteries within some 3180 models have the "Compal" logo imprinted on them instead of "Dell." Though most of their sites are in China, they have some in Vietnam as well. This site has very few shipments, mostly to US Compal and Dell locations.

overview.name: Ych Logistics (Kunshan) Co., Ltd.
overview.description: Ych is a Chinese company that provises storing, managing, and shipping services for my big tech clients, one of those being Dell. Unlike the other sites on this list, the ones owned by Ych have extensive details about them available online, including images of the site and contact information.

location.address: No. 108 Xing Pu Road, Suzhou Industrial Park, Jiangsu, China

overview.name: Dell Trade K Usa N
overview.description: Another Dell-owned shipping and storage unit in China. Their activity peaked during 2020 and 2021, but it quickly went down in 2022 and 2023.

overview.name: Dell Global Business Center
overview.description: This is one of Dell's largest facilities. It handles sea shipping and storing.

location.address: Industrial Park, Plot 76 , Mukim, 11, Jalan Bukit Tengah, Bukit Tengah, 14000 Bukit Mertajam, Pulau Pinang, Malaysia

overview.name: Dell Products
overview.description: Another Dell facility in the US, which receives shipments from other Dell and Compal facilities in China.

overview.name: Compal Electronics
overview.description: A Compal facility located in the US.

overview.name: YCH Dingya International Container & Transportation Co., Ltd
overview.description: Another YCH facility, functioning the same way as the one located in Jiangsu.

location.address: No. 1088, Li Yang Rd., Shanghai, China
No. 377 Hui Gang Rd., Lingang Logistics Park, Shanghai, China

overview.name: Compal Electronics Tech K Usa K Usa Ng Export Processing
overview.description: Another Compal facility in China. It seems there is a concentration of storage and shipping warehouses in Jiangsu.

overview.name: Dongguan Jiataiyuan Electronics Co.
overview.description: This company is one of the main manufacturers for the 51KD7 batteries commonly used in Dell's Chromebooks, particularly the 3180 model. They also produce a variety of other battery and miscellaneous electronic parts for laptops. Though the country and area within it are available online, there is no additional information on the company or its manufacturing sites. It seems they manufacture these batteries for other companies as well since some of their products do not include the "Dell" logo.
